{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BeagleBoard.org |model=BeagleBone |revision=Blue (Rev A2) |upc=713179634296 |asin=B076LL1K3X |price=80 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Embest Technology |manuf_model=BBONE-BLUE |availability=common |est_release_date=03/2017 |fcc_date= |fcc_id=Z64-WL18SBMOD |ic_id=4511-WL18SBMOD |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=9-18 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Octavo Systems |cpu1_model=OSD3358 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC04G-S100 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16HA-125 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes |wi1_module=Texas Instruments WL18MODGB |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=WL1835MOD |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Battery Protection IC;Seiko;S-8261;;1;,,, 32K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC32A;;1;,,, Barometric Pressure Sensor;BMP280;Bosch;;1;,,, Fault ProtectedCAN Transceiver;TI;TCAN1051;;1;,,, Driver IC for Dual DC Motor;Toshiba;TB6612FNG;;2;,,, 4A Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega;AOZ1284;;1;,,, 150kHz, 2A PWM Buck DC-DC Converter;Diodes Inc;AP1509;;1;,,, 2A, 1 or 2 Cell Li-ion Battery Charger;Monolithic Power;MP2615;;1;,,, Voltage Protection with Automatic Cell Balance;TI;BQ29209;;1;,,, Single Buffer Driver w/Open-Drain Output;TI;SN74LVC1G07;;1;,,, 9-Axis Motion Tracking MPU;InvenSense;MPU-9250;;1;,,, 25V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4778DY;;1;,,, Single Supply Voltage Translator;TI;SN74LV1T126;;1;,,, 2.7-5.5V Dual In/Single Out MOSFET;TI;TPS2105;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Solution for USB;TI;TPD4S012;;2;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;Texas Instruments;TXS0108ERGYR;;2; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, Micro SD Card slot, gyroscope, accelerometer, SPI, I2C, CAN, GPIO, UART, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;4.4.59;Debian 8 |tp_firmware=Debian |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=BeagleBoneXXXXXX, |default_ssid_regex=^BeagleBone[A-F0-9]{6}$, |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |default_user=debian |default_pass=temppwd |oui=F4:5E:AB }} {{TagLine|BeagleBone Blue Board}} :[https://beagleboard.org/blue Product Page]
{{See also|BeagleBoard Devices|List of SBCs}}
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/03/14/80-beaglebone-blue-board-targets-robots-drones-robotics-education/ ''$80 BeagleBone Blue Board Targets Robots & Drones'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/robotics-savvy-beaglebone-blue-turns-on-the-servos/ ''Robotics savvy BeagleBone Blue SBC turns on the servos'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Octavo Systems]]'' [http://octavosystems.com/octavo_products/osd335x/ OSD3358] (ARM Cortex-A8) :Processor: [[TI]] ''Sitara'' AM3358 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :NEON Floating-point Accelerator (ARM Cortex-M3) :2× 32-bit @200MHz Programmable Real-time units (PRUs) *RAM: 512MB (DDR3), Flash: 4GB (8-bit eMMC) *[[Texas Instruments]] TPS65217C PMIC, TL5209 LDO *1x USB 2.0 host, Programmed with Debian Linux
===See also=== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
